comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content:
Grumman G-21A Goose G-AFCH c/n 1009, manufactured in November 1937, owned by Lord Beaverbrook.  It was sold to Royal Dutch Shell for use in the Far East as PK-AER and was destroyed January 26, 1942.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/batman60/8524750604/in/photostream/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/batman60/8524750678/in/photostream/]

In the well known photos above, taken at Roosevelt Field, is the man Lord Beaverbrook?
